name: Tomto Farmer
flavorText: Blood and mud make the richest soil.

name: Tomto Farmer
flavorText: Blood and mud make the richest soil.

name: Battle Farier
flavorText: Shoes the warbeasts with iron, not kindness.

name: Lambi Rancher
flavorText: If it breathes, it can fight. If it bleeds, it can feed.

name: Tomto Miller
flavorText: Grinds the grain, bones, and whatever else gets in the way.

name: War Smith
flavorText: His forge rings louder than any war drum.

name: Potion Merchant
cardText: Once per turn, you can add a +0/+2 counter to a Troop you control. The counter is destroyed at the beginning of your next turn.

name: Pirate Captain
flavorText: He sails for loot, for blood, and for the story they'll tell when he's gone.

name: Hut Builder
flavorText: Walls are just excuses for another brawl.

name: Brutal Spearman
flavorText: His reach is long, but his patience is short.

name: Dread Knight
flavorText: Where his shadow falls, courage rots.

name: Heavy Archer
flavorText: Bows aren't for finesse, they're for punching holes in cowards.

name: Gruff Assassin
cardText: If Gruff Assassin kills a creature on your turn, at the end of your turn increase it's toughness by 1 to a maximum to 2.

name: Savage Cannibal
cardText: Whenever a creature you control dies, add a +0/+1 counter to Savage Cannibal unless it would exceed 5 toughness.

name: General Oorvis
cardText: General Oorvis cannot be blocked by creatures.

name: Bonecrusher
cardText: Once per turn, you may sacrifice a creature to add a +1/+1 counter to Bonecrusher.

name: Witch Doctor
cardText: Once per turn, you can pay 4 Troop points and 2 Mana points to return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Brutal Spearman
flavorText: His reach is long, but his patience is short.

name: Plague
cardText: Plague must be played on an enemy Land Tile. Troops of type Farmer, Rancher, and Miller on attached Land Tile produce no Troop points.

name: Precious Jewels
cardText: Ore Vein must be played on a Mountain Land Tile. Attached Land Tile generated double Mana points per turn, and cannot be Chaotic.

name: Training Ground
cardText: Training Ground must be played on a Land card you control. While you control this Land, all creatures cost 1 less Troop point to cast.

name: War Machine
cardText: War Machine must be played on an enemy Land card. Creatures or Troops defending this land take 1 direct damage. The owner of War Machine can pay its casting cost to return it to their hand from the field.

name: Blood Frenzy
cardText: While Blood Frenzy is under your control, creatures you attack with get a +1/+0 until end of turn. Creatures you defend with get -0/-1 till the start of your next turn. You can destroy Blood Frenzy by sacrificing a creature on your turn.

name: Axe of Oorvis
cardText: Target creature gets +2/+0 counter. If the creature is General Oorvis, creature also gets Trample.
